cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hearing a shout

    Shouts have a range of approximately 1000 metres
        
    Scenario Outline: only hear in-range shouts
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at <Seans-location>
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy should <what-Lucy-hears>
        
        Examples: some simple samples
            |Seans-location|what-Lucy-hears |
            |0, 900        |hear Sean       |
            |800, 900      |not hear nothing|
 
    Scenario: Multiple shouters
#         Given people are located at
#          |name  | x   | y    |
#          |Lucy  | 0   | 0    |
#          |Sean  | 0   | 500  |
#          |Oscar | 110 | 0    |
    
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at 0, 500
        And Oscar is at 1100, 0
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
        But Lucy should hear Sean
      
    Scenario: Shouters should not hear their own shouts
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        When Lucy shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Lucy
